import React from 'react' import { EditIcon, DropdownIcon, TrashIcon } from '../icons' import { TableCell, TableRow, Button, } from '@windmill/react-ui' export class Account extends React.Component { // TODO: Use setters (check non-empty string) and event handlers to update state & push changes to database // onClick() edit button, change row to input boxes on Payee, Description, Category w/ current values as default getAccountType(props) { let accountType = props switch (accountType) { case 1: return 'Wallet'; case 2: return 'Vault'; case 3: return 'Expense'; case 4: return 'Income'; default: return ''; } } render() { return ( {this.props.account.xpub}

{this.props.account.name}

{this.props.account.derivation}

 {this.props.account.notes} {new Date(this.props.account.birthday).toLocaleDateString()} {this.getAccountType(this.props.account.accounttype)} {this.props.account.balance} sats
) } } // export default Account
